name: rabbitfun-launchpad
description: Fun Platform for Token Creation and Trading on BNB Smart Chain

scripts.validate:env: node -e "console.log('âœ… Environment validation: TODO: Implement env validation')"
scripts.validate:config: node -e "console.log('âœ… Configuration validation: TODO: Implement config validation')"
scripts.validate:features: node -e "console.log('âœ… Feature flags validation: TODO: Implement feature validation')"
scripts.validate:security: node -e "console.log('âœ… Security validation: TODO: Implement security validation')"
scripts.validate:production: node -e "console.log('âœ… Production validation: TODO: Implement production validation')"
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:env && npm run validate:config && npm run validate:features && npm run validate:security
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.html
scripts.analyze:staging: npm run build:staging && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.html
scripts.lighthouse: npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --output html --output-path=./lighthouse-report
scripts.performance:check: node -e "console.log('ðŸ“Š Performance check: TODO: Implement performance analysis')"
scripts.bundle:check: npm run build && node -e "console.log('ðŸ“¦ Bundle check: TODO: Implement bundle analysis')"
scripts.security:scan: node -e "console.log('ðŸ”’ Security scan: TODO: Implement security scanning')"
scripts.test:security: node -e "console.log('ðŸ›¡ï¸ Security tests: TODO: Implement security tests')"
scripts.optimize:images: node -e "console.log('ðŸ–¼ï¸ Image optimization: TODO: Implement image optimization')"
scripts.optimize:bundle: npm run build && node -e "console.log('ðŸ“¦ Bundle optimization: TODO: Implement bundle optimization')"
scripts.optimize:css: node -e "console.log('ðŸŽ¨ CSS optimization: TODO: Implement CSS optimization')"
scripts.fresh: npm run reset && npm run dev
scripts.docs:generate: node -e "console.log('ðŸ“š Documentation generation: TODO: Implement docs generation')"
scripts.monitor:performance: node -e "console.log('ðŸ“Š Performance monitoring: TODO: Implement performance monitoring')"

scripts.check:deployment: npm run validate:production && npm run build:production
scripts.ci:deploy: npm ci && npm run build:production && npm run deploy:production
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run validate:all
scripts.pre-push: npm run test:ci && npm run build:production
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build:production
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build:production
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build:production
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build:production

author: RabbitFun Team
